Package control

Class AdmTicket

java.lang.Object
control.AdmTicket
public final class AdmTicket extends Object
Main Management/Controller Class where the most important core methods are stored
Since:
1.0

    • prepararCliente

      public void prepararCliente(AdmSettings.DataMode clientMode)
      Prepares the client for a ticket in its generation proccess, retrieving the proper Cliente client object from the right source either in manual or stored mode, this is to get it ready to be included as part of its new Ticket instance when generating a Ticket
      Parameters:
      clientMode - The current client mode in settings to determine the source to retrieve the client object from, either a stored client object or a just manually registered client
      Since:
      1.0

    • prepararPelicula

      public void prepararPelicula(String nombrePelicula, JTable tablaPelicula, JComboBox comboHorariosDisponibles)
      Prepares a selected existing movie Pelicula object to be ready to be included as part of a new Ticket instance when generating a Ticket
      Parameters:
      nombrePelicula - Movie name to get the specified exitsting corresponding Pelicula movie object
      tablaPelicula - JTable object where information of selected movie would be shown
      comboHorariosDisponibles - JComboBox object where the available showtimes for the selected movie are going to be loaded

    • prepararSala

      public void prepararSala(String nombreSala, JTable tablaSala)
      Prepares a selected existing theater hall Sala object to be ready to be included as part of a new Ticket instance when generating a Ticket
      Parameters:
      nombreSala - Theater Hall name to get the specified exitsting corresponding Sala object
      tablaSala - JTable object where information of selected theater hall would be shown

    • prepararFuncion

      public void prepararFuncion(String horarioElegido, String nombrePelicula, JTable funcionElegida)
      Prepares a selected existing movie show Funcion object to be ready to be included as part of a new Ticket instance when generating a Ticket
      Parameters:
      horarioElegido - movie showtime selected by user
      nombrePelicula - movie name this show is related
      funcionElegida - JTable object where information of this movie show would be shown

    • prepararTicket

      public void prepararTicket(Commons.WindowMode formaProceder)
      Prepares a ticket to be added to the main tickets collection depending on a given WindowMode indicator.

      On creation, a new Ticket instance object is created and populated with its respective attribute objects, which contains the information and options selected by a user in the ticket generation window.

      On update/modification the elementosCine collection in the current Ticket object is cleared to be populated with posibly modified versions of these ones, the current chosen client is set on the ticket and the ticket price is recalculated with this posibly new information in the ticket.

      Parameters:
      formaProceder - A WindowMode enum constant indicator to determine what way to go: creation or modification
      See Also:
      • AdmTicket

    • setSpinnerRange

      public void setSpinnerRange(JSpinner spinnerClientAge)
      Sets a custom SpinnerNumberModel to a given JSpinner element to specify its boundaries
      Parameters:
      spinnerClientAge - A given JSpinner to set up the number model on it, this element is meant to handle a client age, so boundaries are related with that matter
      Since:
      1.6
      See Also:
      • FrmBuscarTicket

    • buscarTicket

      public void buscarTicket(JTable tablaBusqueda, Commons.Filters filter)
      Manages searches for tickets that meet a certain specified criteria
      Parameters:
      tablaBusqueda - A given JTable object to be populated with every ticket information that matches
      filter - A Filters enum constant specifiying the search criteria to apply
      Since:
      1.6
      See Also:
      • Commons

    • llenarRegistroTablaBusqueda

      public void llenarRegistroTablaBusqueda(JTable tablaBusqueda, Ticket ticketEncontrado, int rowIndex, AdmTicket.TipoLlenarRegistro modo)
      Populates only one registry on a given JTable object with the information of the specified given ticket
      Parameters:
      tablaBusqueda - A given JTable to be populated
      ticketEncontrado - A given Ticket object to populate the table with its information
      rowIndex - A given int number that represents the actual row index in the JTable object
      modo - A specified TipoLlenarRegistro enum constant to determine if it is necesary to add a new row, this when populating the tickets table with existing tickets at the search window opening, but when editing a ticket it is not needed to add a row, just to re-populate a certain row where the just edited ticket is, in order to update its information in the table

    • guardianDelGuardado

      public boolean guardianDelGuardado()
      Verifies if exist created tickets that have not been saved in a Cinema Tickets file and sugests to save them.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one ticket (or more) that has not been saved yet, a suggestion to save is shown, the user takes the suggestion and decides to save.

      false for the following reasons: 

         - There are tickets pending to save but when the suggestion to save is
     shown, the user decides not to save.
   - There is nothing to save because there are not tickets created, so 
     the tickets main collection size method returns 0.
   - There is nothing pending to save because the current tickets have 
     already been saved in a Cinema Tickets file.

    • guardar

      public void guardar()
